p: A total of 668 chitosan capsules containing EO of C. citratus, and 668 chitosan capsules with corn oil were prepared with an average weight of 0.07 g. The capsules were transparent and had a smooth surface, a semi-rigid consistency, and a flat surface on one side with a convex shape on the other side. Each capsule was approximately 4 mm × 1.8 mm in size and had a weight of 0.07 ± 0.007 g (Available online as Supplementary Material: 3—photographic record of capsule preparation and in vitro evaluation (fungi control)).
